CustomField.defaultValue: "Post is scheduled to go live at an appropriate time and date (best practice: Monday or Thursday between 7 am and 9 am). Is the blog appropriately spaced apart from other recently scheduled blogs?"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Post is scheduled to go live at an appropriate time and date (best practice: Monday or Thursday between 7 am and 9 am). Is the blog appropriately spaced apart from other recently scheduled blogs?
CustomField.label: Blog Schedule Feedback
